title: Sweet Sex Sexual Fantasies Vol 1-4
description:
Always wanting more...

Haley Gray is 25 years old and a confessed nymphomaniac. She loves strawberries, chocolate and an ice cold lager after a sultry day of fun. She has written about her sexual escapades (a sexual diary if you want to call it that) since she turned 18 years old and there has been quite a few with guys, gals, multiple partners, couples, etc. She moved away from her hot and young mother at 20 but still seduces some of her boyfriends. https://www.smashwords.com/books/view/247784

Rachel Gray was going to stay with her cousin HaleyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s parents for the summer before her freshman year in college. Her own parents were in Europe for the summer and Haley was living in the Bahamas. RachelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life in the Catholic schools had not prepared her for the bombshell that HaleyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s friend Susie was about to drop in her lapÃ¢â‚¬Â¦but then, not many people are able to handle Susie at all!
---------------------
This is a very explicit tale about sex and sexual situations. Rachel Gray is finding out what it means to love sex and loves to write about it.

She is the cousin of Haley Gray, who is founder and CEO of Haley's Sexual Fantasies, which is her Erotica publishing company dedicated to publishing the best Erotica available. Rachel has learned from Haley and is dedicated to bringing you only the best sex stories, written by her, about herself and her friends. "Erotica should be exciting, engaging, keep you interested and get straight to the point." This is what Haley has taught Rachel.

Once you have discovered that you love Rachel's short sex stories you can easily find more by visiting her author page. Each of her sexual stories are unique and takes us on a different one of Rachel's sexual fantasies. This specialized Erotica is bound to keep you tied up for hours if you get carried away (which is rather easy to do).

Strap one on and have a blast with erotic stories that are sure to last. That is the motto that Haley shares with us to give to you. She is kind of quirky at times, but that is why we love her. RachelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s and Haley's short sex stories are sure to keep you entertained and excited until the very end
